allEvents.title: 'Come Meet A Black Person' Anti-Racism Virtual Series
allEvents.description: Racism is at the forefront of all conversations today in this country. America was built upon racism and is a part of all systems and structures. In order to eliminate racism, white America must solve this problem.

allEvents.title: Training Course on Hospital Administration Management
allEvents.description: The health care is an evolving sector currently and it is rapidly changing. These sector has been facing rebirth over time. Therefore, health care providers must be able to advance their skills to be able to evaluate the dynamics especially in health management, advance in medical technology, advance in information technology, gradual change in organization management and the need to achieve sustainable development goals.

allEvents.title: Burglar & Intruder Alarm Specialist Installation Training
allEvents.description: This is one course to do, whether you are an electrician or an absolute beginner, it does not matter. Our alarm installation course will start from scratch and make you a confident alarm installer.

allEvents.title: International Financial Reporting Standards
allEvents.description: Advanced International Financial Reporting Standards (IFRS) have been adopted by more than one hundred countries and are the most widely used financial reporting standards in the world. This advanced EuroMaTech training course looks in far more depth at the accounting standards and those that are not covered in more basic programmes. EuroMaTech has an introductory programme on IFRS and it is recommended that those attending this programme have either attended the introductory programme or have a good working knowledge of IFRS that covers the basic elements.
